title: Choose Love / Help Refugees
subtitle:
For many refugees, arrival in a place of safety is just the start of the journey. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
This holiday season, help a person on the long path towards rebuilding their life. 
⁣⁣
Go to the 'Future' section of http://www.choose.love  and give someone a helping hand today.pic.twitter.com/HRoDZYprKM

title: SRS
subtitle: A huge thank you from all at SRS to the more than 160 people who have helped us reach our crowdfunding target & protect vital services for refugees in Suffolk!! Our appeal is open until 3rd Jan & there are still international food experiences up for grabs! https://www.crowdfunder.co.uk/suffolk-refugee-support-advice-service …pic.twitter.com/8bt93ynHtE

title: CaldewSchool
subtitle:
Drum roll please.........We have collected 1100 pairs of socks this week that will be distributed to refugees over the festive period. Thank you to parents and students who have supported our appeal. 
Wishing you a very happy and peaceful Christmas. pic.twitter.com/AfNvVqoNgH

title: Ungagged!
subtitle: Ungagged is a collective of left wing writers & podcasters. We support independence for Scotland, and are against Tory Brexit, and the scapegoating of immigrants, refugees, trans people and our vulnerable citizens (amongst other principled, logical left wing positions). 1/2 pic.twitter.com/mYoGuDZPt2

title: Pierre-Louis Vézina

title: SCOAN Thessalonica Ministries
subtitle:
CHARITY TO THE REFUGEES IN GREECE
The Emmanuel TV team responded to the needs of the refugees by offering clothes that will help them endure the cold during this harsh winter season. Let's see giving as an assignment from God! 
http://ow.ly/teso50xGfIk 
#Charity #SCOANThessalonicapic.twitter.com/DWIJjkHcof

title: Furness Refugee Support Volunteers
subtitle: Please  retweet. A collection point in Barrow on 18th January.... ideal opportunity to shed extra useful stuff after Christmas. Cash donations very welcome and toiletries. All to be shipped out to the refugee camps to make life a bit more bearable @HeatherFTSUG @davidwoodfrspic.twitter.com/UL7wZGG1wj

title: UNHCR United Kingdom
subtitle:
Many Syrian refugee families are living in informal tented settlements or unfinished buildings. They are especially vulnerable as temperatures plummet below zero and winter storms wreak havoc in camps and settlements. They urgently need your support.

https://trib.al/4TleFvy pic.twitter.com/4wmDItaoiN

title: Refugee Council
subtitle: We asked you to send in messages of welcome for refugees & the response was incredible! We've received HUNDREDS of messages & been hanging them up for refugees to read. They've been the star decorations at our Xmas parties around the country! Thank you for the amazing support.  pic.twitter.com/mn7V1f396T

title: Marfo
subtitle: More than 20 refugees with a residence permit have meanwhile received an employment contract with Marfo in Lelystad. Great to see that after a difficult time they take the opportunity to rebuild a new life. @Timing_nl @werkenLelystad @FleuryMichon @marfo_nl #workpic.twitter.com/xmgER1XtAm

title: Capt Wayne Harrison
subtitle: Out of office is on & all packed ready to head to France  to volunteer supporting Refugees for a few weeks! Have a great Christmas everyone!   pic.twitter.com/Go05f8VH2Q

title: St. Margaret's House
subtitle: Earlier this year, our Yoganest studio hosted @ompowerproject for the first time in the UK. It empowers refugees to lead themselves & members of their communities in the healing practice of trauma-informed yoga. 5 participants graduated following the 10-day long training! pic.twitter.com/VHldx53XUi
